text.div:
ClassificationOrContext

Identifies whether a useContext represents a context or classification for the element

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/classification-or-context defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
classification ClassificationIndicates the useContext is a classification - e.g. Administrative, financial, etc.
context ContextIndicates the useContext is a context - a domain of use - e.g. Particular country, organization or system

name: ClassificationOrContext
description: Identifies whether a useContext represents a context or classification for the element

concept.definition: Indicates the useContext is a classification - e.g. Administrative, financial, etc.
Indicates the useContext is a context - a domain of use - e.g. Particular country, organization or system
